main.name: Taras Kozak

main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: While studying at Ryerson I became proficient in Java and Javascript, but more importantly, I got introduced to a broad range of topics in computer science.  My education helped me get a solid foundational knowledge in data structures, algorithms, machine learning, data science, networks, operating systems, and software design.

work.title: Automation Developer Intern
work.description: As an automation developer, I was responsible for developing automation test scripts for a credit card web application using Java/Selenium WebDriver. Over the course of the term I developed over 150 new automation scripts as well as refactored the existing once to improve execution speed. I also created a small Java library for automated HOST mainframe testing using IBM's HACL library which enabled my team to write automation scripts that were able to set up test users in the mainframe - a task that was previously done manually before each test execution.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
